btrplace.plan

Class DefaultPlanApplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.plan.DefaultPlanApplier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReconfigurationPlanApplier
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DependencyBasedPlanApplier, TimeBasedPlanApplier

    public abstract class DefaultPlanApplier
extends Object
implements ReconfigurationPlanApplier
    A skeleton for ReconfigurationPlanApplier. It provides the material to propagate the notifications related to the termination of actions and events.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      • fireAction

        public void fireAction(Action a)
        Propagate the action to every listener added by addEventCommittedListener(EventCommittedListener). Events hooked on Action.Hook.PRE are propagated in first Then the real action is propagated. Finally, events hooked on Action.Hook.POST are propagated
        Parameters:
        a - the event to propagate
